items.sentence: I used to watch TV at least three hours every day.
I can't believe Tom did all this without any help.
All the girls in Tom's class are in love with him.

Even if I were rich, I wouldn't give money to Tom.
You look like you could use another pair of hands.

The assignment took me longer than I had expected.

I suspect Tom and Mary both have houses in Boston.
